attributes.additional_details:
The nation was in shock as vandals destroyed people livelihoods and tried to undermine our very fragile economic recovery with senseless violence, anarchy would of been imminent but for that thin blue line that we all owe our liberty too I'm talking of course about  the police forces of this great country!

I call on the government to show the nation's gratitude by rewarding the officers who so bravely risked their lives to protect us with medals for each officer that fought unarmed to save us the public from mindless hooligans. I also call on the government and both sides of the house to get behind the police and for all politicians to recognize the vital contribution the police make to this country especially with the Olympic Games beginning in less than a year.
